features: Anti-aging skin care: Our body lotion is formulated with the optimal balance of 12% Glycolic Alpha Hydroxy Acid (AHA) and a pH level of 4.0; AHA encourages reduces the appearance of lines and wrinkles

Radiant skin: Our anti-aging cream’s exfoliating formula gently lifts away dead skin cells so new, healthy skin can emerge; your skin will immediately feel smooth and fresh; over time, you will see a more radiant, even skin tone
Powerful ingredients: Paraben and fragrance-free; Alpha Skin Care uses essential, natural ingredients with clinically-proven results to reveal healthy, younger-looking skin
Packed with vitamins & nutrients: Leave your skin feeling soft and smooth; vitamins and nutrients combined with anti-aging ingredients enhance the benefits you’ll see and feel

Directions: Apply to desired areas of clean skin, and do not rinse off; may be used morning and evening; for daytime use, we recommend also applying a sunscreen; first-time users should do a patch test

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Poor scent, but good cream
reviews.reviewText: I've been using this skin cream for a while now, and I must say that I've experienced some notably positive results. The cream has proven to be effective in enhancing the overall health and moisture levels of my skin.One of the most noticeable benefits of this skin cream is its ability to provide a deep and lasting hydration to my skin. After regular use, my skin feels noticeably more moisturized, and this added hydration has contributed to a healthier overall complexion. It's reassuring to see a product that lives up to its promise of increasing skin moisture, as dryness can be a common issue for many individuals.Moreover, I've noticed that my skin appears to be more radiant and supple since incorporating this cream into my skincare routine. The added moisture seems to have a plumping effect, making my skin appear fuller and more youthful. This is particularly valuable as maintaining skin elasticity and preventing premature aging are top priorities for many skincare enthusiasts.The cream also gets bonus points for its texture and application. It goes on smoothly and is easily absorbed by the skin, which is a relief for those who dislike heavy or greasy products. It doesn't leave any residue or sticky feeling, making it comfortable to wear both during the day and as part of a nighttime routine.Furthermore, it's essential to mention the quality of the ingredients used in this cream. It's clear that the formulation includes ingredients that promote skin health and hydration, which aligns with my skincare goals.In summary, I can confidently say that this skin cream has had a positive impact on my skincare regimen. It has rejuvenated my skin, making it appear healthier, more hydrated, and plumper. The ease of application and quality of ingredients further add to its appeal. If you're seeking a cream that delivers on its promise to improve skin moisture and health, this product is certainly worth considering.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing Product-Poor packaging
reviews.reviewText: Corrects dry, crepey skin with one application. Awesome product! VERY difficult to get out of the bottle. Poor packaging. Company needs to put this in a squeeze tube or a tub-style bottle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Packaging is awful
reviews.reviewText: The cream is moisturizing and exfoliating. There is no awful scent like Amlactin has. I would give 5 stars except for the fact that getting the product out of the bottle is a daily struggle. I wish they would improve on this issue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This works guys!
reviews.reviewText: I must say the majority of the reviews are right with this one. I have been using it for about a week and I definitely feel a difference. I don’t see it so much yet but I definitely feel that my skin is softer and feels more moisturized. I have KP and it has softened that too. I feel like I need to use it longer to get it to go away with steady use. I Will say the bottle is ridiculous. It is more of a butter or cream than a lotion and the bottle makes it very hard to squeeze out the product. Your hands are slippery from using it and is hard to squeeze with one hand. I will need to transfer it to another bottle. Right now, I squeeze with both hands on to the top of my thigh and then scoop it up with my finger (it’s that thick) then put it in the palm of my hand. I do mix it with a little body oil or regular lotion to help smooth it out over my skin a little easier because it’s thick af. You won’t go wrong. I will not be using reg. Lotion alone again! Game changer for real!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bought Multiple Bottles
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this lotion! It moisturizes well but works even better as an exfoliant. It is fairly strong and you will definitely feel the tingling when you first apply it, though it disappears quickly. The lotion itself is very rich and is more akin to a body butter. It is not scented, although to me it smells just a tad sour-ish, which is expected. I slather it on everywhere, including on my feet. If you have brittle nails, it’s worth looking into the effects of Glycolic Acid on nails too. It’s absolutely fantastic as an exfoliant before or after sunless tanning also. If you have any doubts if it works, just look at the tanned dead skin in the shower after you use it. This also works great if you fudge the tan some too as it will strip the remnant patches. Obviously don’t use this on your skin if you like to extend the life of your sunless tanner. This is also terrific for treating KP. It won’t remove it immediately but you will absolutely see a difference after multiple uses. It’s also great for the skin on your elbows, knees and feet; basically anywhere where you need exfoliation. I have sensitive skin and severe eczema and this lotion does not aggravate either, though, I strongly recommend that you do not put it on eczema spots as it will only promote the inflammatory skin “change”. This lotion will also help with hyperpigmentation, although, you won’t see the full result until several skin cycles have passed. Anyhow, if you’re on the fence, just pull the trigger and buy it. You will absolutely not regret it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great Product- Needs Better Packaging
reviews.reviewText: This lotion is thick and rich. The struggle is there is no pump. The bottle is hard plastic which makes it impossible to squeeze. Due to the thickness of the lotion even leaving the bottle upside down you can’t get the lotion out. The consumer should not have to work to use the product. Please add a pump that can dispense the lotion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this moisturizer
reviews.reviewText: I have very dry skin & live in the north. Which doesn't help matters. RX creams and suggestions from Dr didn't help. New Dr suggested this and IT WORKS!!!!My only complaint is that it is so hard to get out of the bottle. Maybe a pump might help. Then again, the consistency may be too thick for a pump. I just hate asking for another set of hands to squeeze the bottle to get some out. I even tried turning it upside down for 2 days...it didn't slide down to the lid.I guess we're sort of getting a 2 for 1. Lotion that softens the skin AND a workout.😊😊

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing for dry, rough or bumpy skin
reviews.reviewText: Very thick and hydrating and increases cell rejuvenation making your skin soft and smooth. I use it all over my body 3x a week. I also find regular use under arms eliminates underarm odor entirely.

This stuff is amazing!!I have struggled with rough skin for years. Nothing worked. Even with professional facials, my skin would become rough again within a few short days.This makes my skin feel so smooth. I highly recommend.
Es muy buena , alisa la piel , ideal para usar en invierno
I was actually really impressed with this product because after continuous use, it definitely helped my skin. Just use it continuously for best results.
An excellent body cream, does what it promises
